ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors thank the Chief Research Officer at SEIPASA, Francisco Espinosa Escrig, for carrying out the stability tests and providing the emulsifiable concentrates of winter savory and peppermint essential oils for in vivo assays and the Central Service for Experimental Research of the University of Valencia (SCSIE) for providing the Greenhouse and Gas Chromatography- Mass Spectrometry equipment.
